Select the new school that their children will go..

You must access your account.
This application aims to improve communication between teachers, students and parents and Guardian.
If this is the first time you access the application or not yet registered, please register using the button:
This takes you to the selection of the role with which it is recorded:
When deciding what kind of user you are going to registar will access a form to fill.
If you have already accessed the application or have an account, use the button below:
You reach the login screen where you must enter the email with which you registered and password:
When you access the application, it is responsible for checking with the database, which is in the cloud, which type of user.

Depending on the type of user you are, flanges or other will appear. Roles: 

	# Student: 
		* My class: User classmates. 
		* My teachers: Teacher who teaches the user. 
		* New notifications: Messages it receives from other users of the application. 

	# Teacher: 
		* Teachers: Colleagues who teach some of the courses the user. 
		* Fathers: Parents of students to the class gives the user. 
		* My students: Students who gives the user class. 
		* New notifications: Messages it receives from other users of the application. 

	# Father: 
		* Fathers: Parents of students classmates child user. 
		* Teachers: Teacher who teaches his son user. 
		* New notifications: Messages it receives from other users of the application.
If you are a teacher, you can send both circular to all parents and all children of one or more classes with button:
All users can send events, ie, schedule appointments in the calendar and even the device of Google. For this use:

From any of the contacts listed on the eyelashes with a short selection, you can access a chat that retrieves messages sent and stored in the cloud. This implements instant messaging over the Internet. \ nUsing large selection can view the contact data.
From the options in the "Title bar" of the application can access the user data to modify them. This includes changing your own password.
Both from the Welcome screen or from the access, the options of "Title bar" of the application, you can access the device settings, and using the Internet, and the choice of application language.
